rpgonline.texture.entity

Class WalkCycleTexture

  • java.lang.Object
    • rpgonline.texture.entity.WalkCycleTexture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityTexture

    public class WalkCycleTexture
extends java.lang.Object
implements EntityTexture
    A texture for an entity walk cycle.
    Author:
    Tomas

        north - The offset for north.

        south - The offset for south.
        west - The offset for west.

        speed - The speed of the walk cycle.
